games.title: Cube Drop Puzzle
games.description:
Join the ultimate puzzle challenge in Cube Drop Puzzle

Test your strategic thinking in this addictive game where you must drag and drop furniture-shaped blocks to match colors with their corresponding stick figures. Plan your moves carefully as you navigate limited space and increasingly complex levels. With its vibrant visuals and easy-to-learn mechanics, Cube Drop offers endless hours of brain-teasing fun!

Key Features:

Unique Puzzle Mechanics: Combine the best of block puzzles and color-matching games.
Challenging Levels: Navigate tricky layouts and test your problem-solving skills.
Intuitive Controls: Simply drag and drop to play!
Vibrant Visuals: Enjoy colorful graphics that bring each puzzle to life.
Progressive Difficulty: Start easy and work your way up to more challenging levels.
Ready to drop into the fun? Download Cube Drop Puzzle and start solving today!
games.howToPlayText:
üß© How to Play
- Drag and move the holes across the board
- Match each cube to its correct color block hole
- Let the glasses drop smoothly into the hole
- Solve each puzzle step by step, using logic and strategy
- Complete the level when all coffee cups fall into the right place

games.title: Wood Blocks Jam
games.description:
Wood Blocks Jam is a relaxing logic puzzle game with colorful wooden blocks. Your goal is to drag each block into a gate of the same color. No time limits ‚Äî just calm, thoughtful gameplay.

Enjoy thousands of handcrafted levels with increasing difficulty and new mechanics to discover. Use powerful boosters to help you solve tough puzzles:
üîß Saw ‚Äì cuts through annoying blocks,
üî® Hammer ‚Äì smashes any single block,
‚ú® Magic ‚Äì removes 3 random blocks.

Perfect for players of all ages, Wood Blocks Jam combines strategy, color-matching, and satisfying visuals in one cozy package.
games.howToPlayText:
Wood Blocks Jam is easy to learn and fun to master:

üì± On mobile: Drag blocks with your finger and drop them into the matching color gates.

üñ±Ô∏è On desktop: Click and hold the left mouse button to grab a block, then drag it to the correct gate.

Your goal is to clear the board by matching each colored block with its corresponding gate. As you progress, the puzzles get trickier ‚Äî introducing new mechanics, obstacles, and challenges. Think ahead, plan your moves carefully, and don‚Äôt forget to use boosters if you‚Äôre stuck!

games.title: Block Blast jewel puzzle
games.description:
Block Blast: Jewel Puzzle - Think Fast. Stack Smart. Rule the Leaderboard! Dive into Block Blast: Jewel Puzzle, the ultimate block puzzle game that mixes calm strategy with thrilling competition. Easy to play, hard to master - and impossible to stop playing! 
Game Features: 
Classic Mode: Relax and clear blocks endlessly at your own pace. 
Timer Mode: Race against time ‚Äî think fast before the clock runs out! 
Level Mode: Conquer challenging stages that test your logic and precision. Smooth & Colorful Gameplay: Drag, drop, and fit blocks with satisfying visuals. 
Global Leaderboard: Compete with players worldwide ‚Äî climb the ranks and prove your puzzle skills! 
 Perfect for All Ages: Simple mechanics, deep strategy ‚Äî pure fun for everyone. If you love Tetris, Block Blast, or brain-training puzzle games, this one‚Äôs for you. Start stacking, clearing, and claiming your spot at the top today!
games.howToPlayText:
Desktop / PC: Mouse or Touchpad: Drag and drop blocks into the grid.
Mobile / Touchscreen: Tap & Drag: Move blocks into place with your finger.

games.title: Stack Master
games.description:
Stack master is a minimalistic, endless stacking game where your goal is to build the tower as high as possible by perfectly aligning moving blocks.
The graphics are simple and clean, focusing on smooth gameplay without distractions.
You compete globally for the highest score (tower height) on leaderboards.
games.howToPlayText:
When you start, a block (or ‚Äúslice‚Äù) begins sliding horizontally across the screen at some height.
You tap the screen (or tap a control) to drop the moving block onto the block beneath it.
The better the alignment with the block below, the more of the block remains. If part of the block overhangs, the overhanging part is cut off.
If you drop with a slight misalignment, the excess portion is cut away and removed, making your next block smaller.
If your misalignment is very poor (i.e. almost no overlap), you might lose the block entirely, ending the game.
Each successful drop continues the tower upward. The goal is to stack as many as possible, reaching the highest possible height (score).
As the tower gets higher, it becomes more challenging. The blocks may move faster or require more precision. (This is common in stacking games of this type.)
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/stack-master?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Hexa Block Puzzle
games.description:
Try our highly addictive unique hexagonal pieces puzzle game!
Use your puzzle skill and put blocks into board.
Hexa BlockPuzzle will improve your logical skills and mind power.
Difficulty level will be increase as much as you play.
games.howToPlayText:
Arrange the hexagon blocks to fit in the board / grid.
You can‚Äôt rotate the block.
One‚Äôs you put into grid you will rearrange too.
No time limits!
Getting stuck! Don‚Äôt worry use hint.

games.title: Slide Block Jam
games.description:
Slide Block Jam: The Ultimate Puzzle Adventure

Unleash your puzzle-solving skills in Slide Block Jam, the ultimate block puzzle game that will challenge your mind and keep you hooked for hours! In this captivating and strategically engaging game, your goal is simple: move colorful blocks to their matching colored doors to clear the way. However, each level introduces new obstacles and challenges, requiring you to think carefully and plan your moves to master every puzzle.

Endless Puzzles, Limitless Fun
Prepare yourself for puzzles designed to test both your logic and strategic thinking. As you progress, the levels become increasingly intricate and creative, keeping you engaged with new challenges at every turn. Whether you're sliding blocks to clear space or navigating through tough barriers, the thrill of solving each puzzle intensifies.
games.howToPlayText:
How to Play:
* Slide the blocks: Move the colorful blocks to their matching colored doors.
* Solve each puzzle: Plan your moves carefully to clear the path and complete the puzzle.
*Think strategically: Every level presents a new challenge, so use your wits to find the most efficient way to clear the blocks.
* Unlock new challenges: With each level you complete, new and more difficult obstacles open up, keeping the excitement going!

games.title: Nubik in the Monster World!
games.description:
Nubik saved the kittens and defeated all the monsters! But it wasn‚Äôt over yet - the monsters came back!
The evil Huggy has kidnapped all the kittens again!

But this time, Nubik got himself a whole arsenal of new weapons! In the game, you'll find an AK-47, an M16 rifle, a grenade launcher, a machine gun, and two powerful shotguns!

Help Nubik find the kittens to earn a million coins! Search for and open loot chests. Upgrade your character and blow up TNT blocks! Also, Nubik‚Äôs friend often gets captured by monsters and thrown behind bars. Help Nubik escape from prison!
games.howToPlayText:
In the settings menu, you can enable the auto-shoot feature ‚Äî it's especially convenient when playing on a phone. You can also adjust mouse sensitivity for PC or swipe sensitivity for mobile in the main menu. The radar will help you easily navigate through the level!
Controls:
For PC:
Mouse ‚Äì rotate the camera
Tab or Esc ‚Äì pause
WASD ‚Äì move
Left mouse button ‚Äì shoot
F or E ‚Äì interact

For mobile:
Swipe on the screen to rotate the camera
Joystick ‚Äì move
Tap quickly on the screen ‚Äì shoot

games.title: Money Ping Pong
games.description: Join the exciting journey of Money Ping Pong, an engaging idle game where you manage money blocks to influence bouncing balls and boost profits. Explore diverse maps, unlock new blocks, and enjoy a mix of strategy and chill gameplay on your device as you create your virtual wealth!
games.howToPlayText: Money ping pong - casual logical arcade game for all ages, where players place blocks on the game board to earn in-game currency and progress through levels. Use skills to grow progress faster

games.title: Constructor Bricks
games.description:
An exciting building game awaits you, where you can immerse yourself in the world of creative design. The game offers many levels with a variety of models, from simple objects to complex architectural masterpieces. Each project includes step-by-step instructions, making it easy for players to follow and assemble unique structures.

This is a great way to develop spatial thinking skills, attentiveness, and patience. During the assembly process, you will not only have fun but also learn about different design approaches and architectural styles. Participate in exciting challenges, compete with friends, and share your successes.

Join the community and discover an amazing world where your imagination becomes reality, even if you follow clear instructions!
games.howToPlayText:
The construction set is assembled by clicking on the blocks specified in the instructions.

To drag blocks, hold the cursor or finger on the desired block

games.title: Space Rovers
games.description: Strap in and get ready to conquer the Red Planet in Space Rovers ‚Äî a physics-based rover builder and cargo delivery game where your engineering skills are the key to survival. Design unique vehicles, transport goods across unforgiving Martian landscapes, and experience the thrill of interplanetary logistics like never before.
games.howToPlayText:
Assemble rovers from a wide selection of wheels and blocks. No two vehicles are the same ‚Äî each build reflects your creativity and problem-solving skills. Whether you favor compact designs or massive cargo haulers, the possibilities are endless.

Desktop Controls:
‚Üë (Up Arrow) / ‚Üí (Right Arrow): Move forward.
‚Üì (Down Arrow) / ‚Üê (Left Arrow): Move backwards.

Mobile Controls:
Left Pedal: Move forward.
Right Pedal: Move backwards.

games.title: Block Puzzle Tropical Story
games.description:
Block Puzzle Tropical Story is a vibrant puzzle game that blends relaxing gameplay with a sense of island adventure. You‚Äôll connect blocks, solve clever challenges, and unlock stunning tropical locations. As you explore lush jungles and serene beaches, each level rewards you with stars and new areas, turning every puzzle into a step deeper into paradise.

The booster system will help you in difficult situations, and the well-thought-out mechanics allow both beginners and experienced players to enjoy the game.

Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of a tropical paradise with beautiful graphics, relaxing music, and fascinating gameplay! Each successfully completed challenge brings you closer to discovering new horizons, and accumulated stars become the key to the next chapters of this exciting journey.

A relaxing puzzle game where you connect blocks while traveling through picturesque tropical islands. Collect stars, unlock new locations, and immerse yourself in the resort atmosphere!
games.howToPlayText: Complete tasks in levels and open new locations. Hold and drag the left mouse button to drag and drop the blocks.

games.title: Bricks Buster
games.description: Bricks Buster is a fun and addictive arcade game! Aim, shoot, and break bricks to clear levels. Use power-ups, plan your shots, and enjoy endless brick-breaking action!
games.howToPlayText: Swipe to aim and release to shoot the balls. Break all the bricks before they reach the bottom. Each brick shows the number of hits needed to destroy it. Use power-ups to clear tough levels faster. Bounce shots off walls to hit more bricks and create combos. The level ends when all bricks are cleared or reach the bottom. Keep aiming smart and breaking bricks to achieve high scores!

games.title: Unstack Tower
games.description: Unstack Tower is an addictive puzzle game that challenges players to dismantle a tower of colored cubes in a specific sequence. This game combines the mechanics of a traditional board game with modern gameplay, providing hours of fun. Players must carefully unstack the cubes without causing the tower to collapse, which requires strategy and quick reflexes. The game features various materials, including glass and wood, adding an extra layer of complexity to each level.
games.howToPlayText:
Use clicks or taps to place or drop blocks.
You may be able to rotate or position pieces for optimal placement.
When blocks of the same color group together (usually in clusters of 3 or more), they vanish, freeing up space and earning points.
If blocks are placed unevenly or stacked too loosely, the tower may collapse, leading to game over.

games.title: Pop Puzzle
games.description:
Welcome to the colorful world of Pop Puzzle!
Pop Puzzle is here to test your skills with challenging levels.

Pop Puzzle is a block matching puzzle game with colorful visuals and simple gameplay. Its key appeal is in how easily you can pick it up and play but with increasingly challenging levels that test your pattern-spotting skills.
games.howToPlayText:
Tap on groups of two or more blocks that are the same color.
Match the blocks to make them pop. 
Your mission: clear all the blocks on the screen to finish the level.

games.title: Block Sort Puzzle
games.description: Block Sort Puzzle is an exciting multi-colored block sorting puzzle that will test your logic and attentiveness! Sort as fast as possible to collect the highest tower, as well as to multiply your points! Nice animation of moving tiles.
games.howToPlayText:
How to play:
- Drag the blocks onto the desired tile.
- Put the same colors side by side to combine and score points.
- When combining blocks, the multiplier of the current points increases.

games.title: Block Blast Mania
games.description:
In Block Blast Mania , your mission is simple: try to place colorful blocks of various shapes on the game board in such a way that complete rows are formed. A fully filled row or column without any gaps will disappear from the board, making room for new blocks. The more rows you destroy at once, the more points you'll earn.
There are two game modes. In the classic mode, the game will continue until there‚Äôs no space left on the board to place one of the three shapes. In the level-based mode, you need to complete objectives such as collecting pigs.
Boosters help you get through the levels.
games.howToPlayText: Drag the block from the bottom to the grid to place it. You can't rotate the blocks, but you can place them in any place or order that you want. Fill the colums or rows to destroy them and get points

games.title: Block Blast
games.description: Dive into this popular and free puzzle game designed to stretch your brain and entertain you during your free time. Your mission is simple yet thrilling: match and remove as many blocks as possible from the board.
games.howToPlayText: Use your mouse or finger (on touch devices) to move and place the blocks on the board. Arrange them to form complete lines horizontally or vertically. When a line is completed, it will disappear, giving you more space to keep playing. Try to clear as many lines as possible without running out of space. The more lines you remove, the higher your score!

games.description: Dive into the captivating world of Stack the Blocks, a strategic online puzzle game on a 10x10 grid. Challenge your logic by placing blocks to clear lines and earn points. Accessible yet complex, it guarantees addictive entertainment on both mobile and desktop platforms.
games.howToPlayText: The 10√ó10 game board is your canvas for creativity and strategy. Place the offered blocks to form solid horizontal or vertical lines. Once a line is complete, it disappears, making room for new pieces.

games.description: Merge Combo is a captivating puzzle game that allows you to merge similar blocks for points and combos. Playable online for free, it offers a mix of relaxation and challenge as you stack cubes to achieve higher scores, appealing to logic puzzle enthusiasts across all devices.
games.howToPlayText:
Simple, yet addictive Match 2/Merge Puzzle game.

Drag and merge identical blocks enjoying awesome combos!
How large a number can you get?

games.description: Arkanoid For Painters is a thrilling online game where players create barriers to control a ball, clearing blocks and foes. It blends classic gameplay with artistic elements, catering to creative strategists. Available on iOS, Android, and desktop, it guarantees entertaining challenges on the go.
games.howToPlayText:
In this game you draw an obstacle for a ball instead of controlling a boring board.

Also plenty of interesting upgrades are waiting for you. 

Draw with left mouse button or your finger.

games.howToPlayText: Tap 3D Wood Block Away is a challenging and addictive puzzle game where you rotate and tap to clear blocks, unlocking complex 3D structures. With intuitive controls, simply swipe to rotate and tap to remove cubes in the correct order. Progress through increasingly tricky levels, sharpen your spatial thinking, and enjoy a satisfying puzzle experience at your own pace!

games.title: TetraDice‚ÄìMerge & Blast Blocks
games.description: Play TetraDice ‚Äì Match & Build Blocks, a free puzzle game blending Tetris and dice mechanics! Strategically place dice-based shapes, clear lines, and challenge your logic. Enjoy Normal & Endless Modes, unique levels, and addictive gameplay. Start playing now!
games.howToPlayText:
- Your goal is to create combinations using the provided figures.
- You get points for successfully collected combinations and perform special tasks.
- The more matches - the more points.
- In adventure mode, you need to complete levels by completing assigned tasks.
- In classic mode, your goal is to score the maximum number of points before the game ends.

Controls

PC
LMB (left mouse button) - selects, rotates and moves figures.

Mobile
Touch (tap) - rotates the figure.
Dragging with your finger - moves the figure on the playing field.

games.title: Dice Puzzle
games.description: Dice Puzzle is a puzzle game where your task is to strategically place numbered cubes on the board, aiming to merge three adjacent cubes with the same number. As they combine, their value increases. Carefully select cubes with different points, considering their placement to match with others effectively. Be mindful, as cubes may appear individually or in pairs. Merge three or more dice horizontally or vertically to create higher-valued cubes. Utilize the storage space wisely to save cubes for later use. Test your puzzle-solving skills in this engaging dice-merging game!
games.howToPlayText:
Select a die (or a pair) from your tray and drag it onto the grid where it fits.
Tap the dice in the tray to rotate them before placing, especially helpful for pairs
When three or more dice of the same face touch, whether horizontally or vertically (even diagonally adjacently), they automatically merge into one higher-value die

games.title: Jewel Blocks
games.description: Enter the dazzling world of Jewel Blocks, a captivating free online game designed to sharpen your mind and elevate your gaming experience. In this logic-infused arcade challenge, players are tasked with strategizing the perfect placement of classic block shapes to smash high scores and unlock a treasure trove of rewards. With its easy-to-learn mechanics and a vast array of customizable skins, Jewel Blocks promises endless hours of entertainment on both computer and mobile devices. Are you ready to take on this glittering challenge?
games.howToPlayText:
Slide the block shapes into the grid and create rows or columns to remove them.
After 10 successful moves, your undo feature charges up.

games.title: A Block Too Many
games.description: Build a tower, reach the stars! In this challenging and addictive block-stacking game, you play as an alien trying to escape a mysterious planet. Strategic stacking is key: each block has unique properties, and one mistake can make your tower collapse. Unlock new levels, blocks and customizations as you play. Choose between a challange mode to unlock levels Or compete for the largest tower in endless mode. Wana chillout there is even a sandbox mode to build into the stars.
games.howToPlayText:
Either with the onscreen controle for mobile, or the keyboard on PC, you controle your ship to decide where to stack blocks.  You need to get to a sertain hight to escape the planet. 

Get stars as rewards. Then use those stars to buy skins or temporary updates like see what the next block will be or more ship speed.

games.title: Tile Stack
games.description:
This game is perfect for players who enjoy puzzle and strategy games. Its simple mechanics and increasing difficulty levels make it both accessible and addictive.
You will not realize how time passes by playing fun levels by putting tiles together
games.howToPlayText:
Tiles fall from the top of the screen.
Click or tap on a tile to select it.
Move the selected tile to another tile based on the arrow that shows directions to stack them together.
When tiles are stacked, they disappear, earning you points.

games.title: Tower Colour Crash
games.description:
Crash the Tower! Only the best crashers will be able to destroy all
towers in this 3D physics game. Try to let all towers collapse with
the amount of given balls. But you will only destroy the shapes
with the same colour as you ball. Use the powerful earthquake or
shotgun power ups, to create huge chain reactions, which will
lead into the towers destruction. Beautiful designed levels and
shapes will await you, so don‚Äôt waste any second and become
the greatest tower crasher of ‚Äòem all!
games.howToPlayText:
- Start each level by choosing the right angle to hit the tower, swipe right or left.
- Throw the Ball on Blocks of the matching colour to destroy it!
- Make the Tower collapse!

games.title: Tower Tap
games.description:
Where every tap brings you closer to victory! In this fun and addictive puzzle game, your mission is to clear layers of colorful cubes to reach the treasure chest at the bottom. The fewer taps you use, the bigger the reward!
Each tower is made up of layers filled with cubes of different colors. When you tap a cube, all connected blocks of the same color pop and disappear. But be careful! You'll need to think ahead to plan your moves and clear the tower efficiently. Every tap counts!
games.howToPlayText:
Tap Same-Colored Cubes ‚Äì Touch groups of cubes with the same color to break them. The more cubes in a group, the better.
Clear Tower Layers ‚Äì Keep popping cubes to go down each layer of the tower.
Reach the Treasure Chest ‚Äì Your goal is to open the chest at the bottom by clearing all the layers above it.

games.title: Wood Color Block
games.description:
Wood Color Block is a new free puzzle game that combines fun, relaxing and brain-teasing challenges! 
Step into a world of colorful wooden blocks, where your goal is to crush all color blocks by move them to their perfect color crushers ‚Äì the more you smash, the more fun it gets! 
Every level brings a new set of challenges, with increasing difficulty and clever block arrangements that will keep you on your toes.
games.howToPlayText:
Slide the color blocks: Find the way to get the color blocks into the same color crushers to break them. Whether you're sliding, moving, or aligning the blocks, each action you take requires careful thought and planning.
Clear your path before time runs out: With exciting puzzles and unique block mechanics, you'll need to think strategically to break all the blocks and escape before time runs out.
Boosters: As you progress, you'll unlock new tools and power-ups to help you overcome even the toughest puzzles

games.title: Block Blast Master
games.description:
Step into the world of strategy and precision in this addictive block puzzle game! Start by selecting a block from the set and simply drag and drop it onto the board. Choose each position wisely‚Äîevery move can shape the outcome of your game.

Create complete horizontal or vertical lines to clear them from the board and earn valuable points. The more lines you complete, the more space you free up for new blocks!

Think ahead and plan your moves carefully. Anticipate which shapes might come next and leave room for future placements‚Äîsmart planning is key to mastering the game.

The game ends when there‚Äôs no space left to place a new block. How long can you keep playing? Challenge yourself to score as high as possible!
games.howToPlayText:
Select a block from the available blocks, then drag that block onto the playing field.
If blocks form complete horizontal or vertical lines, they will disappear - you will earn points.
Plan ahead.

Clear stages and try new challenges!

Step into this action-packed universe and unleash your full potential by upgrading and deploying TNT, rockets, and a myriad of explosive powers upon cubic settlements. Play online for free without the hassle of downloading, and dive into a world where destruction meets strategy, all within the comfort of your browser. With its seamless integration across platforms such as iOS, Android, and desktop, Block Mine Fuse TNT offers a dynamic experience for gamers on the go or at home.

Jump, run, and don‚Äôt fall! Help Steve navigate dangerous levels filled with traps, chasms, and true cubic madness.

The levels keep getting harder, and your reaction speed and jumping precision are your only hope.

This game is perfect for both beginners and those who consider themselves masters of parkour in virtual worlds.

Are you ready to show what Steve is capable of in the world of parkour?

games.title: Blockadventure io
games.description:
üåç Welcome to BlockAdventure!

Dive into the thrilling world of BlockAdventure, a Minecraft-inspired online multiplayer experience packed with parkour challenges, obby adventures, and endless fun! Explore blocky worlds, compete with other players, and push your skills to the limit. Whether you‚Äôre jumping across floating platforms or racing through tricky maps, there‚Äôs always something exciting to do.

Customize your style in the Skin Menu ‚Äî choose your favorite look and stand out from the crowd as you conquer each obstacle!

And the best part? This is just the beginning.
New game modes and adventures are already on the way!

üöÄ Coming Soon Features
	‚Ä¢	üéÆ Mini-Games Hub ‚Äì Unlock and play various mini-games with friends
	‚Ä¢	üß© Puzzle-Based Maps ‚Äì Solve environmental puzzles to progress
	‚Ä¢	üë• Custom Avatars & Skins ‚Äì Personalize your character even more
	‚Ä¢	üèÜ Leaderboard System ‚Äì Climb the global ranks and show off your skills

‚∏ª

üïπÔ∏è Controls

Desktop Controls:
	‚Ä¢	W / A / S / D or Arrow Keys: Move
	‚Ä¢	Spacebar: Jump

	‚Ä¢	Back Button: Go back to previous checkpoint

FUN BLOCK PUZZLES

COLLECT NEW CATS

games.title: Balls: Ricochet!
games.description:
Balls: Ricochet! - an arcade shooting game. The project pays tribute to the memory of old retro gaming. If you consider yourself a true connoisseur of games, you should play this game and immerse yourself in nostalgia. The game will delight you:
-Authentic gameplay
-Correct ball physics
-Good visual design
The exciting, addictive gameplay will immerse you in the pursuit of the best score for a long time. The concept, developed in the early 80s, still works perfectly. Start playing and beat your friend's score! 
Also pay attention to the following parts of the "Balls", have a nice game!
games.howToPlayText: Your task in the game is to set the direction of the ball. The ball destroys blocks using the environment of the level, you can set the direction of the ball so that it ricochets off the walls and blocks, so in one shot you can knock out several blocks at once.

games.title: Stack Up
games.description:
Stack Em Up! is a casual single-player puzzle game where your goal is to connect stacks of the same color to combine them. By chaining same-colored stacks, you build longer stacks; you try to reach stacks of length 10 or more.
It‚Äôs stylised and simple in controls.
There are many levels that get progressively more challenging.
games.howToPlayText:
Tap on a stack: You select a stack by tapping it.
Connect with other stacks of the same color: Once you select a stack, you try to link it to other stacks of the same color to form a longer chain.
Form stacks / chains of 10 or more: One of the objectives is to make long stacks (length ‚â• 10). Bigger stacks give more ‚Äúscore‚Äù / help you meet level-goals.
Watch your moves: You have limited moves or constraints per level; you must achieve the objective before you run out of moves, or before you run out of opportunity. 
Progress through levels: Levels get harder as you go, likely adding complications (more colors, tricky board layouts, etc.).

games.title: Fill The Lines
games.description: Lines to Fill is a thinking game where you draw lines to complete the given puzzle shape. Simply drag one of the colorful blocks using your finger or the left mouse button, and make sure there are no blank spots left. Since the game has no time limits and no way to lose, you can enjoy this stress-free experience complete with hundreds of unique levels on your computer or mobile device. Can you block out some time and finish every level?
games.howToPlayText:
You see a puzzle ‚Äúshape‚Äù made up of empty (blank) spots.
At the bottom (or somewhere), there are colorful blocks (pieces), each made of line-segments or shapes.
You drag a block using your finger (touch screen) or with mouse (click & drag)
You place it into the puzzle shape so that it fits ‚Äî you want to fill all blank spots, leaving no gaps.
There is no time limit, and there‚Äôs no losing condition ‚Äî you just progress by completing levels.
